ygData.subject: Re: At our base
ygData.msgSnippet: Astroblast walks over to the energon storage room. The glow from the power source bathes his body in pink light. He looks on in awe. Wildrider follows him in,

Subject: Re: At our base
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Astroblast walks over to the energon storage room. The glow from the power
source bathes his body in pink light. He looks on in awe. Wildrider follows
him in, behind him. "You guys did a good job" Astroblast says in awe. He
grabs a cube and puts sucks it down, "Ahhhh, energon. Sgood stuff". He
throws the cube away. "Ha ha ha, hey watch out you dont overenegize there"
Wildrider states in a moking tone. "Nope, Im good. and I feel real good"
replies Astroblast. Dead-End walks in behind them. "Astroblast" he says,
"there is a downed stasis pod at the Grand Canyon. It could end up a new
troop". Astroblast turns around and looks at the Stunticons, "Very well,
you and Wildrider will come with me, Drag Strip and Speedbreaker can stay
here and guard the base. Lets move out". As he walks out the two others
follow him.
